summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1331, for the improvement of Third Avenue Northwest, from West Kilbourne Street to West Forty-fifth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and crosswalks thereon, together with all necessary grading and curbing, as part thereof, under Ordinance No. 14977 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
